thread.title: Soda tax still catches shoppers by surprise
thread.title_full: Soda tax still catches shoppers by surprise

author: Emily Babay
title: Soda tax still catches shoppers by surprise
text:
Soda tax still catches shoppers by surprise Updated: January 3, 2017 — 1:26 PM EST 145 Share Emily Babay Staff Writer 
Emily Babay is a breaking news producer. She writes about everything from crime to transit problems — and occasionally about good news. More by Emily Babay 
signed into law a bill placing a 1.5-cent-per-ounce levy on sugary drinks, including diet beverages. 
went into effect Sunday at the start of the new year. As 2016 ended, outreach teams were making stops around the city to alert store owners about the new tax. 
City Council's vote passing the tax , many consumers have still been surprised this week when they were charged higher prices for sweetened beverages .
